org.edg.data.replication.optorsim

Class GridConfFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.GridConfFileReader

  • public class GridConfFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a method to read the grid configuration file and build a route map, for the site to site connections. Other methods are provided to return the reconstructed information.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static GridConfFileReader getInstance()
        * Returns an instance of the GridConfFileReader, instantiating it if * called for the first time and returning the existing instance otherwise.

      • createGridSites

        public void createGridSites()
        Routine to assign GridSites, with Computing and Storage Elements based on the Grid configuration file.

      • read

        private void read()
        A method to read the grid configuration file.

      • associateNeighbours

        private void associateNeighbours()
        Tell all the GridSites to ask about neighbouring sites. This has to be done after the network routes are established

      • findRoutes

        private void findRoutes()
        Routine to find the best route from all GridSites to all other GridSites and store this information in the GridContainer.

      • dijkstraSearch

        private java.util.Map dijkstraSearch(GridSite sourceSite,
                                     java.util.Map neighbours)
        Search for the shortest routes for a site to all other sites using Dijkstra's Algorithm. (see http://ciips.ee.uwa.edu.au/~morris/Year2/PLDS210/dijkstra.html) This quickly finds the shortest route from a selected site to all other sites.

      • relax

        private void relax(GridSite pSite,
                   GridSite nSite,
                   GridSite sourceSite,
                   float bw,
                   java.util.Map estimate,
                   java.util.Map predecessor)
        Method for doing a Dijkstra "relax" step. Basically looks to see if routing via the primary site pSite is better for the neighbouring site nSite.
        Parameters:
        pSite - The primary site
        nSite - The neighbouring site
        sourceSite - The source site for the Dijkstra calculation
        bw - The link bw for going from primary site to neighbouring site
        estimate - The current map of bw estimates
        predecessor - The map of predecessor. This maps a GridSite to a GridSite, indicating the optimal route.

      • getMinimumHopRoute

        private void getMinimumHopRoute(GridSite pSite,
                                GridSite nSite,
                                GridSite sourceSite,
                                java.util.Map predecessor)
        Method for checking which of two possible routes in a Dijktsra calculation has the fewest number of hops back to the source site.
        Parameters:
        pSite - The primary site
        nSite - The neighbouring site under consideration
        sourceSite - The source site for this Dijkstra calculation
        predecessor - The map of predecessors. This maps a GridSite to a GridSite, indicating the optimal route.

      • extractHighestBandwidth

        private GridSite extractHighestBandwidth(java.util.Set sites,
                                         java.util.Map costs)
        Search for the highest bandwidth site in a given set. It also removes this site from the Set
        Parameters:
        sites - The set of sites to consider
        costs - A Map that maps from GridSite to Float bandwidth.
        Returns:
        A GridSite with the highest bandwidth, or null

      • buildNeighbours

        public java.util.Map buildNeighbours()
        Look in connectivity matrix and produce a Map of neighbours. This map takes a GridSite as the key and returns a further Map. This second Map contains all the neighbouring sites and their associated costs.
        Returns:
        A map describing network costs between sites

      • getSiteByID

        private GridSite getSiteByID(int id)
